refnamediv.refpurpose: Convert time domain load-pull CST measurement file into a CITIfile for Agilent ADS.

listitem.para: String parameter : filename of the CST file including the path.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function convert a time domain load-pull measurement file (*.CST) into a CITI file in order to include measurement in a Agilent ADS Datadisplay.

refsection.title: Examples
